info.title: Google Books
info.description: Leverage Google Books content with full-text search and book information.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Id of user for whom to retrieve bookshelves. (string)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location. (string)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request. (string)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Retrieves a list of public Bookshelf resources for the specified user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Id of user for whom to retrieve bookshelves. (string)

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: Id of bookshelf to retrieve. (string)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location. (string)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request. (string)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Retrieves a specific Bookshelf resource for the specified user.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location. (string)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request. (string)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Retrieves a list of Bookshelf resources belonging to the authenticated user. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: Id of bookshelf to retrieve. (string)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location. (string)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request. (string)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Retrieves a specific Bookshelf resource belonging to the authenticated user. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: Id of bookshelf to which to add a volume. (string)

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: Id of volume to add. (string)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location. (string)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request. (string)

post.description: Adds a volume to a mutable pre-defined or user-defined bookshelf. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: Id of bookshelf from which to remove a volume. (string)

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: Id of volume to remove. (string)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location. (string)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request. (string)

post.description: Removes a volume from a mutable pre-defined or user-defined bookshelf. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: Id of bookshelf from which to clear all volumes. (string)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location. (string)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request. (string)

post.description: Clears all volumes from a bookshelf. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: volumeId
parameters.description: Id of volume to retrieve. (string)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location. (string)

parameters.name: partner
parameters.description: Identifier of partner for whom to brand results. (string)

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description:
Restrict information returned to a set of selected fields. (string)
Applicable values:
- full: Includes all volume data
- lite: Includes a subset of fields in volumeInfo and accessInfo.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request. (string)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Retrieves a Volume resource based on ID. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Id of volume to retrieve. (string)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location. (string)

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Restrict to volumes by download availability. (string)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Filter search results. (string)
Applicable values:
- ebooks: All Google eBooks.
- free-ebooks: Google eBook with full volume text viewability.
- full: Public can view entire volume text.
- paid-ebooks: Google eBooks with a price.
- partial: Public able to see parts of text.

parameters.name: langRestrict
parameters.description: Restrict results to books with this language code. (string)

parameters.name: libraryRestrict
parameters.description: Restrict search to this user's library. (string)

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return. (integer, 0-40)

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description:
Sort search results. (string)
Applicable values:
- newest: Most recently published.
- relevance: Relevance to search terms.

parameters.name: partner
parameters.description: Identifier of partner for whom to restrict and brand results. (string)

parameters.name: printType
parameters.description:
Restrict to books or magazines. (string)
Applicable values:
- all: All volume content types.
- books: Just books.
- magazines: Just magazines.

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description:
Restrict information returned to a set of selected fields. (string)
Applicable values:
- full: Includes all volume data.
- lite: Includes a subset of fields in volumeInfo and accessInfo.

parameters.name: showPreorders
parameters.description: Set to true to show books available for preorder. Defaults to false. (boolean)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request. (string)

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Index of the first result to return (starts at 0) (integer, 0+)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Performs a book search. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: The bookshelf id or name retrieve volumes for. (string)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location. (string)

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (integer, 0+)

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description:
Restrict information returned to a set of selected fields. (string)
Applicable values:
- full: Includes all volume data.
- lite: Includes a subset of fields in volumeInfo and accessInfo.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Full-text search query string in this bookshelf. (string)

parameters.name: showPreorders
parameters.description: Set to true to show pre-ordered books. Defaults to false. (boolean)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request. (string)

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Index of the first element to return (starts at 0) (integer, 0+)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Retrieves a list of Volume resources for a given bookshelf. Authentication is required.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Id of user for whom to retrieve bookshelf volumes. (string)

parameters.name: shelf
parameters.description: Id of bookshelf to retrieve volumes. (string)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO-3166-1 code to override the IP-based location. (string)

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (integer, 0+)

parameters.name: showPreorders
parameters.description: Set to true to show pre-ordered books. Defaults to false. (boolean)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: String to identify the originator of this request. (string)

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Index of the first element to return (starts at 0) (integer, 0+)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Retrieves volumes in a specific bookshelf for the specified user.

info.title: Google Books
